name: Jump: Escape Mysterious Cave
description:
Jump: Escape Mysterious Cave is a simple 2D action adventure crazy game where you have to go from one point to the other. Just beware of the traps. Join into a challenging adventure. Run and jump your way through dangerous trap and puzzled dungeon. Watch out because the rooms are full of spikes, pits, and other deadly dangers. Do you have what it takes to escape safetly from this dangerous ancient cave!
Features:
- 2D crazy adventure game
- Multiple levels with increasing difficulty
- A wide variety of traps
- Easy to use controls
- Puzzle game with lots of puzzles to solve using your brain
- A bunch of surprises that you may or may not like
- Special hard levels for hardcore gamers
